NeedMask.title: Prevent the Spread of Respiratory Infections
NeedMask.information: Wearing masks helps reduce the transmission of respiratory droplets, which can contain viruses like COVID-19.

NeedMask.title: Protect Vulnerable Populations
NeedMask.information: Mask-wearing can safeguard vulnerable individuals, such as the elderly and those with underlying health conditions.

NeedMask.title: Minimize the Impact on Healthcare Systems
NeedMask.information: By wearing masks, we can decrease the number of infections and alleviate the burden on healthcare facilities.

NeedMask.title: Promote a Sense of Community and Solidarity
NeedMask.information: Wearing masks demonstrates care for others and fosters a collective effort to protect public health.

NeedMask.title: Reduce Respiratory Allergens and Irritants
NeedMask.information: Masks can help people with allergies or respiratory conditions by filtering out allergens and pollutants.

NeedMask.title: Limit the Spread of Airborne Diseases
NeedMask.information: Masks can effectively control the transmission of various airborne diseases, including influenza and common cold.

NeedMask.title: Prevent Asymptomatic Transmission
NeedMask.information: Mask-wearing can reduce the risk of asymptomatic individuals unknowingly spreading infections.

NeedMask.title: Enable Safer Social Interactions
NeedMask.information: Masks allow for safer interactions with others, particularly in crowded or indoor settings.

NeedMask.title: Support Economic Recovery
NeedMask.information: By controlling the spread of infections, masks play a role in maintaining economic activities and stability.

NeedMask.title: Recommended by Health Authorities
NeedMask.information: Health organizations worldwide endorse mask-wearing as a preventive measure during pandemics.

NeedMask.title: Prevent Overwhelm of Testing Systems
NeedMask.information: Mask-wearing helps limit the number of infections, reducing the demand for testing resources.

NeedMask.title: Reduce the Risk of Future Pandemics
NeedMask.information: Implementing mask-wearing during outbreaks can help prevent the emergence of new pandemics.

NeedMask.title: Respect for Cultural Norms
NeedMask.information: In some cultures, wearing masks is a sign of respect during periods of illness or contagion.

NeedMask.title: Complement Other Preventive Measures
NeedMask.information: Masks are one of several tools used together to control the spread of infectious diseases.

NeedMask.title: Protect Healthcare Workers
NeedMask.information: Widespread mask usage reduces the risk of healthcare workers contracting illnesses from patients.

NeedMask.title: Ensure Safe Travel
NeedMask.information: Mask-wearing in travel settings helps protect travelers and curb the cross-border spread of diseases.

NeedMask.title: Instill Confidence in Public Spaces
NeedMask.information: People feel more at ease visiting public places where mask-wearing is encouraged and practiced.

NeedMask.title: Maintain Educational Activities
NeedMask.information: By preventing outbreaks, schools and educational institutions can remain operational with fewer disruptions.

NeedMask.title: Curb Fear and Anxiety
NeedMask.information: Masks can reduce anxiety about virus transmission, enabling individuals to go about daily activities.

NeedMask.title: Part of Responsible Citizenship
NeedMask.information: Wearing masks is a responsible action that contributes to the well-being of the community.
